New Records: Ireland scored 183-5 in reply to Pakistan's 182-6, their first T20 win over Pakistan since 2009
Key Match Events: Curtis Campher scored the winning run with a leg bye; Ireland performed well in the field with two run-outs and catches; Craig Young took crucial wickets of Babar Azam and Azam Khan in the same over
Pre-Game Insights: Ireland had a 2-1 series loss to Afghanistan before the match; Captain Paul Stirling's strategy was to chase around 180 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Captain Paul Stirling expressed confidence in the chase; the win was a significant boost for the team ahead of the T20 World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was Pakistan's first T20 since their 2023 World Cup win; the second match between the teams was scheduled for Sunday
